content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":250552,"originalJapaneseLine":"　イベントの時系列図なのです」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a timeline diagram of the events."},{"lineNumber":250553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「箱のように表示されているのは、＜次の出来事＞です。","translatedEnglishLine":"The boxes displayed like this represent the <Next Event>."},{"lineNumber":250554,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何歩先、何メートル先、何分後、何日後、かは分かりませんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s unknown how many steps ahead, meters ahead, minutes later, or days later,"},{"lineNumber":250555,"originalJapaneseLine":"　進んだ先にある＜次の出来事＞となっています。」","translatedEnglishLine":"but it shows the <Next Event> that lies ahead after progressing."},{"lineNumber":250556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こういう＜次の出来事＞の連続して集まりが","translatedEnglishLine":"A connected series of such <Next Events>"},{"lineNumber":250557,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大きな物語＜クエスト＞となります。」","translatedEnglishLine":"forms a larger story, a <Quest>."},{"lineNumber":250558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜次の出来事＞では、いろいろなイベントが発生します。","translatedEnglishLine":"Various events occur at each <Next Event>."},{"lineNumber":250559,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦闘の場合もあります、何かいい物を拾う時や、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sometimes battles happen, or you might find something good,"},{"lineNumber":250560,"originalJapaneseLine":"　回復出来る場所とかもあります。」","translatedEnglishLine":"and there are also places where you can recover."},{"lineNumber":250561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はにほー","translatedEnglishLine":"Haniho~ (a cheerful greeting)"},{"lineNumber":250562,"originalJapaneseLine":"　説明おわり」","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s the end of the explanation."},{"lineNumber":250563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今回は通常のＲＰＧと違う成長表現になっています","translatedEnglishLine":"This time, the growth system is different from usual RPGs."},{"lineNumber":250564,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜Ｌｖ４２ ランス＞は、最初からＬｖ４２となっていますが","translatedEnglishLine":"<Lv 42 Rance> starts off at level 42,"},{"lineNumber":250565,"originalJapaneseLine":"　Ｌｖアップする事はありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"but you will not level up further."},{"lineNumber":250566,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、どうやって強くなっていくかというと","translatedEnglishLine":"So, how do you become stronger?"},{"lineNumber":250567,"originalJapaneseLine":"　Ｌｖではなく、☆ランク（戦闘熟練度のような物）を","translatedEnglishLine":"Instead of level, you increase your ☆ Rank (like combat proficiency)."},{"lineNumber":250568,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランクアップしていく事で強くなっていきます」","translatedEnglishLine":"By ranking up your ☆ Rank, you become stronger."},{"lineNumber":250569,"originalJapaneseLine":"「また同じ＜Ｌｖ４２ ランス＞を取得すると","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, if you obtain the same <Lv 42 Rance>"},{"lineNumber":250570,"originalJapaneseLine":"　重ね＋１となり強くなります」","translatedEnglishLine":"they stack +1 and become stronger."},{"lineNumber":250571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「冒険を進めていくと＜Ｌｖ４５ ランス＞＜Ｌｖ５５ ランス＞","translatedEnglishLine":"As you progress, you can get versions like <Lv 45 Rance> and <Lv 55 Rance>."},{"lineNumber":250572,"originalJapaneseLine":"　など同じキャラの別バージョンを取得出来ます。」","translatedEnglishLine":"These are different versions of the same character."},{"lineNumber":250573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「同じキャラの場合、☆ランクは共通です。","translatedEnglishLine":"For the same character, ☆ Rank is shared."},{"lineNumber":250574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜Ｌｖ４２ ランス＞で☆５にすると、それ以外のランスも","translatedEnglishLine":"If <Lv 42 Rance> reaches ☆5, then the other Rances"},{"lineNumber":250575,"originalJapaneseLine":"　☆５になります」","translatedEnglishLine":"also become ☆5."},{"lineNumber":250576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はにほー","translatedEnglishLine":"Haniho~"},{"lineNumber":250577,"originalJapaneseLine":"　説明おわり」","translatedEnglishLine":"End of explanation."},{"lineNumber":250578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦果、勲章、食券","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle Achievement, Medals, and Food Tickets"},{"lineNumber":250579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それぞれ３個まで持つ事が出来る","translatedEnglishLine":"You can hold up to three each."},{"lineNumber":250580,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とても重要な物です」","translatedEnglishLine":"They are very important items."},{"lineNumber":250581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦果","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle Achievement"},{"lineNumber":250582,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　各地域での戦闘結果に大きな影響が出ます、超重要」","translatedEnglishLine":"Significantly affects battle results in each region—extremely important."},{"lineNumber":250583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「勲章","translatedEnglishLine":"Medals"},{"lineNumber":250584,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　３つ貯まると部隊ランクが上がります、超重要」","translatedEnglishLine":"When you collect three, the unit rank increases—very important."},{"lineNumber":250585,"originalJapaneseLine":"「食券","translatedEnglishLine":"Food Tickets"},{"lineNumber":250586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　キャラのイベントを見たりパワーアップに使います、超重要」","translatedEnglishLine":"Used to view character events or power up—very important."},{"lineNumber":250587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜難易度＞敵の総合的な強さです。","translatedEnglishLine":"<Difficulty> represents the overall strength of the enemies."},{"lineNumber":250588,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ボス等を倒すなどすると上がっていきます","translatedEnglishLine":"It increases when you defeat bosses and so on."},{"lineNumber":250589,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※　だいたい、ターン数と同じ値が標準値です」","translatedEnglishLine":"*Generally, the standard value is about the same as the turn count."},{"lineNumber":250590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人類死亡率","translatedEnglishLine":"Humanity Death Rate"},{"lineNumber":250591,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ある意味、タイムリミットのような物となります","translatedEnglishLine":"In a way, it's like a time limit."},{"lineNumber":250592,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　被害が増大すると終末が訪れます」","translatedEnglishLine":"If the damage increases too much, the apocalypse will come."},{"lineNumber":250593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リーザス、ヘルマン、ゼス、自由都市の戦況","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle situation in Leazas, Helmann, Zeth, and the Free City."},{"lineNumber":250594,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この４つの地域を守る事が重要となります","translatedEnglishLine":"Protecting these four regions is important."},{"lineNumber":250595,"originalJapaneseLine":"　常に味方の兵力数は確認しておきましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Always keep an eye on the number of friendly troops."},{"lineNumber":250596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はにほー","translatedEnglishLine":"Haniho~"},{"lineNumber":250597,"originalJapaneseLine":"　説明おわり」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's the end of the explanation."},{"lineNumber":250598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス１０を","translatedEnglishLine":"Tips for playing Rance 10"},{"lineNumber":250599,"originalJapaneseLine":"　より楽しくプレイする為のコツをお伝えします」","translatedEnglishLine":"to enjoy it more."},{"lineNumber":250600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その１","translatedEnglishLine":"Tip 1"},{"lineNumber":250601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　１度のプレイで全部手に入れる事は出来ません","translatedEnglishLine":"You cannot get everything in a single playthrough."},{"lineNumber":250602,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最初は、完璧は考えないのが良いです」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s best not to aim for perfection at first."},{"lineNumber":250603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その２　","translatedEnglishLine":"Tip 2"},{"lineNumber":250604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝てない敵、厳しいルートは無視して進めましょう","translatedEnglishLine":"Ignore enemies you can’t beat and difficult routes, and keep moving forward."},{"lineNumber":250605,"originalJapaneseLine":"　宝箱があっても回復優先がいいですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if there’s a treasure chest, prioritize recovery."},{"lineNumber":250606,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その３","translatedEnglishLine":"Tip 3"},{"lineNumber":250607,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類滅亡になってもしかたないよ、うん","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s okay if humanity gets wiped out, yeah."},{"lineNumber":250608,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次もっとうまくやりましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do better next time."},{"lineNumber":250609,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かぁーーーー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaaa--- (expressive sound)"},{"lineNumber":250610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このゲーム、少し難しめです","translatedEnglishLine":"This game is a bit on the challenging side."},{"lineNumber":250611,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界がピンチになり絶望的になっても","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if the world falls into crisis and becomes desperate."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イベントの時系列図なのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a timeline diagram of the events.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「箱のように表示されているのは、＜次の出来事＞です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The boxes displayed like this represent the <Next Event>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何歩先、何メートル先、何分後、何日後、かは分かりませんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s unknown how many steps ahead, meters ahead, minutes later, or days later,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 進んだ先にある＜次の出来事＞となっています。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it shows the <Next Event> that lies ahead after progressing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういう＜次の出来事＞の連続して集まりが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A connected series of such <Next Events>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな物語＜クエスト＞となります。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forms a larger story, a <Quest>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜次の出来事＞では、いろいろなイベントが発生します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various events occur at each <Next Event>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘の場合もあります、何かいい物を拾う時や、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes battles happen, or you might find something good,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 回復出来る場所とかもあります。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there are also places where you can recover.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はにほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniho~ (a cheerful greeting)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明おわり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s the end of the explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回は通常のＲＰＧと違う成長表現になっています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, the growth system is different from usual RPGs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜Ｌｖ４２ ランス＞は、最初からＬｖ４２となっていますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Lv 42 Rance> starts off at level 42,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｌｖアップする事はありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you will not level up further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、どうやって強くなっていくかというと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, how do you become stronger?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｌｖではなく、☆ランク（戦闘熟練度のような物）を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Instead of level, you increase your ☆ Rank (like combat proficiency).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランクアップしていく事で強くなっていきます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By ranking up your ☆ Rank, you become stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また同じ＜Ｌｖ４２ ランス＞を取得すると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, if you obtain the same <Lv 42 Rance>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重ね＋１となり強くなります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they stack +1 and become stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「冒険を進めていくと＜Ｌｖ４５ ランス＞＜Ｌｖ５５ ランス＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As you progress, you can get versions like <Lv 45 Rance> and <Lv 55 Rance>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: など同じキャラの別バージョンを取得出来ます。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These are different versions of the same character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「同じキャラの場合、☆ランクは共通です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For the same character, ☆ Rank is shared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜Ｌｖ４２ ランス＞で☆５にすると、それ以外のランスも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If <Lv 42 Rance> reaches ☆5, then the other Rances

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ☆５になります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: also become ☆5.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はにほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniho~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明おわり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: End of explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦果、勲章、食券
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle Achievement, Medals, and Food Tickets

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それぞれ３個まで持つ事が出来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can hold up to three each.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても重要な物です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are very important items.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦果
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle Achievement

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地域での戦闘結果に大きな影響が出ます、超重要」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Significantly affects battle results in each region—extremely important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勲章
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medals

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３つ貯まると部隊ランクが上がります、超重要」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you collect three, the unit rank increases—very important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「食券
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Food Tickets

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャラのイベントを見たりパワーアップに使います、超重要」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Used to view character events or power up—very important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜難易度＞敵の総合的な強さです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Difficulty> represents the overall strength of the enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボス等を倒すなどすると上がっていきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It increases when you defeat bosses and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　だいたい、ターン数と同じ値が標準値です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Generally, the standard value is about the same as the turn count.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人類死亡率
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity Death Rate

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある意味、タイムリミットのような物となります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a way, it's like a time limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 被害が増大すると終末が訪れます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the damage increases too much, the apocalypse will come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス、ヘルマン、ゼス、自由都市の戦況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle situation in Leazas, Helmann, Zeth, and the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この４つの地域を守る事が重要となります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Protecting these four regions is important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に味方の兵力数は確認しておきましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Always keep an eye on the number of friendly troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はにほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniho~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明おわり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the end of the explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス１０を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tips for playing Rance 10

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: より楽しくプレイする為のコツをお伝えします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to enjoy it more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その１
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tip 1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １度のプレイで全部手に入れる事は出来ません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You cannot get everything in a single playthrough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初は、完璧は考えないのが良いです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s best not to aim for perfection at first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その２
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tip 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝てない敵、厳しいルートは無視して進めましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignore enemies you can’t beat and difficult routes, and keep moving forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱があっても回復優先がいいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if there’s a treasure chest, prioritize recovery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その３
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tip 3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類滅亡になってもしかたないよ、うん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s okay if humanity gets wiped out, yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次もっとうまくやりましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do better next time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かぁーーーー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaaa--- (expressive sound)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このゲーム、少し難しめです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This game is a bit on the challenging side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界がピンチになり絶望的になっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if the world falls into crisis and becomes desperate.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

playthrough."},{"lineNumber":250602,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最初は、完璧は考えないのが良いです」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s best not to aim for perfection at first."},{"lineNumber":250603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その２　","translatedEnglishLine":"Tip 2"},{"lineNumber":250604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝てない敵、厳しいルートは無視して進めましょう","translatedEnglishLine":"Ignore enemies you can’t beat and difficult routes, and keep moving forward."},{"lineNumber":250605,"originalJapaneseLine":"　宝箱があっても回復優先がいいですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if there’s a treasure chest, prioritize recovery."},{"lineNumber":250606,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その３","translatedEnglishLine":"Tip 3"},{"lineNumber":250607,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類滅亡になってもしかたないよ、うん","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s okay if humanity gets wiped out, yeah."},{"lineNumber":250608,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次もっとうまくやりましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do better next sound)"},{"lineNumber":250610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このゲーム、少し難しめです","translatedEnglishLine":"This game is a bit on the challenging side."},{"lineNumber":250611,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界がピンチになり絶望的になっても","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if the world falls into crisis and becomes desperate."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イベントの時系列図なのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a timeline diagram of the events.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「箱のように表示されているのは、＜次の出来事＞です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The boxes displayed like this represent the <Next Event>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何歩先、何メートル先、何分後、何日後、かは分かりませんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s unknown how many steps ahead, meters ahead, minutes later, or days later,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 進んだ先にある＜次の出来事＞となっています。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it shows the <Next Event> that lies ahead after progressing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういう＜次の出来事＞の連続して集まりが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A connected series of such <Next Events>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きな物語＜クエスト＞となります。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forms a larger story, a <Quest>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜次の出来事＞では、いろいろなイベントが発生します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various events occur at each <Next Event>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘の場合もあります、何かいい物を拾う時や、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes battles happen, or you might find something good,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 回復出来る場所とかもあります。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there are also places where you can recover.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はにほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniho~ (a cheerful greeting)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明おわり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s the end of the explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回は通常のＲＰＧと違う成長表現になっています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, the growth system is different from usual RPGs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜Ｌｖ４２ ランス＞は、最初からＬｖ４２となっていますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Lv 42 Rance> starts off at level 42,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｌｖアップする事はありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you will not level up further.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、どうやって強くなっていくかというと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, how do you become stronger?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｌｖではなく、☆ランク（戦闘熟練度のような物）を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Instead of level, you increase your ☆ Rank (like combat proficiency).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランクアップしていく事で強くなっていきます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By ranking up your ☆ Rank, you become stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また同じ＜Ｌｖ４２ ランス＞を取得すると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, if you obtain the same <Lv 42 Rance>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重ね＋１となり強くなります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they stack +1 and become stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「冒険を進めていくと＜Ｌｖ４５ ランス＞＜Ｌｖ５５ ランス＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As you progress, you can get versions like <Lv 45 Rance> and <Lv 55 Rance>.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: など同じキャラの別バージョンを取得出来ます。」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These are different versions of the same character.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「同じキャラの場合、☆ランクは共通です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For the same character, ☆ Rank is shared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜Ｌｖ４２ ランス＞で☆５にすると、それ以外のランスも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If <Lv 42 Rance> reaches ☆5, then the other Rances

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ☆５になります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: also become ☆5.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はにほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniho~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明おわり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: End of explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦果、勲章、食券
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle Achievement, Medals, and Food Tickets

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それぞれ３個まで持つ事が出来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can hold up to three each.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても重要な物です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are very important items.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦果
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle Achievement

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地域での戦闘結果に大きな影響が出ます、超重要」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Significantly affects battle results in each region—extremely important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勲章
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medals

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３つ貯まると部隊ランクが上がります、超重要」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you collect three, the unit rank increases—very important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「食券
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Food Tickets

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャラのイベントを見たりパワーアップに使います、超重要」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Used to view character events or power up—very important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜難易度＞敵の総合的な強さです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Difficulty> represents the overall strength of the enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボス等を倒すなどすると上がっていきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It increases when you defeat bosses and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　だいたい、ターン数と同じ値が標準値です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Generally, the standard value is about the same as the turn count.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人類死亡率
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity Death Rate

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある意味、タイムリミットのような物となります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a way, it's like a time limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 被害が増大すると終末が訪れます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the damage increases too much, the apocalypse will come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス、ヘルマン、ゼス、自由都市の戦況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle situation in Leazas, Helmann, Zeth, and the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この４つの地域を守る事が重要となります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Protecting these four regions is important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常に味方の兵力数は確認しておきましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Always keep an eye on the number of friendly troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はにほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniho~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明おわり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the end of the explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス１０を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tips for playing Rance 10

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: より楽しくプレイする為のコツをお伝えします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to enjoy it more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その１
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tip 1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １度のプレイで全部手に入れる事は出来ません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You cannot get everything in a single playthrough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初は、完璧は考えないのが良いです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s best not to aim for perfection at first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その２
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tip 2

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝てない敵、厳しいルートは無視して進めましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignore enemies you can’t beat and difficult routes, and keep moving forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱があっても回復優先がいいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if there’s a treasure chest, prioritize recovery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その３
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tip 3

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類滅亡になってもしかたないよ、うん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s okay if humanity gets wiped out, yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次もっとうまくやりましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do better next time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かぁーーーー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaaa--- (expressive sound)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このゲーム、少し難しめです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This game is a bit on the challenging side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界がピンチになり絶望的になっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if the world falls into crisis and becomes desperate.
